Recommendations: it is recommend to utilize the result of the laboratory survey for the improvement of the delivery of instruction through laboratory work
availability of functional fire extinguisher in every laboratory room is recommend
laboratory stock room be recommend to house electronic component and equipment for safe keep and thus laboratory room have more space to work on
it is recommend that echoseminar training be conduct to the faculty and staff in the use of high end laboratory equipment
as base on the cmo the college may purchase additional equipment require in the program for the effective and efficient delivery of knowledge to the student
it is recommend that the task force may substantiate each benchmark statement with relevant and update document
